name: 小糸
text:
う、うわー……
楽屋って言ってたけど、見えちゃってるよね……！？
trans:
Uhh, whoa... 
They said this was backstage, but everyone can see in here, can't they...!?

name: 雛菜
text:
あは～、ステージってあれ～？
紅白の垂れ幕～！
trans:
Aha～ Is that the stage～?
With the red-and-white festival curtains～!

name: 円香
text:
──音響もやばいんじゃない
さっきの歌手のリハ、ボーカルしか聞こえなかった
trans:
──Audio's pretty awful, too. 
The singer was rehearsing just now──you couldn't hear anything except the vocals.

name: 透
text:
ふふっ
緊張する？
trans:
Fufu.
Getting nervous?

name: 小糸
text: う、ううん……！

name: 小糸
text: 今日は、大丈夫……！
trans: I'm totally fine today...!

name: 小糸
text:
あの時は、
なんにも見えないから、怖かったけど────
trans: Back then, I couldn't see anything, and it scared me so much──

name: 小糸
text: でも、今日は
trans: But, today...

name: 小糸
text: みんなで始めるために、来たんだもん
trans: I'm here so I can begin again with everyone!

name: 小糸
text:
え、えっへん！
わたししか完璧に歌って踊れないんだもん！
trans:
A... ahem!
I'm the only one with the singing and dancing down perfectly!

name: 小糸
text: わたしがしっかりしなきゃ！
trans: I've gotta have my act together!

name: 透
text: 頼んだ
trans: Counting on you.

name: 透
text:
こんばんはー
ノクチルです
trans:
Good evening.
This is Noctchill.

name: 雛菜
text:
わ～～～！
雛菜たちのこと、誰も見てない～！
trans:
Wooow～! 
There's not a single person watching us at all～!

name: 小糸
text: あ、アウェーって感じだね……
trans: I──it's kind of like no-one cares if we're here...

name: 円香
text: 出音……完全に花火に負けてる
trans: The speakers... just totally drowned out by the fireworks.

name: 透
text: あー……
trans: Aaahh...

name: 透
text:
えーと、歌います
聴いてください
trans:
Well, um... we're going to sing.
Please enjoy.

name: 透
text: ふふふっ
trans: Fufufu.

name: 透
text: まぁ、やろ
trans: Whatever. Let's do it.

name: 透
text:
いいんだよね
今日は
trans:
It's good, isn't it?
Today is.

name: 透
text: うちらがよければ
trans: As long as we're all good with it.

name: 円香
text:
海に来たんだな……
みたいなことを思ってた
trans:
So we made it to the sea...
That's more or less what was going through my head, then.

name: 円香
text:
花火がうるさくて
返しなんて全然聞こえなくて
trans: The fireworks were so deafening. Couldn't hear the monitors at all.

name: 円香
text:
客席とか、現実感なくて
ぼんやりしてた
trans: You looked at the seating area in front of you, and there was no reality to it. I was just completely tuned out.

name: 透
text:
じゃあ、わかった
つぎはみんなでりょこう行こう
trans:
Okay. Got it.
Next time, let's all go somewhere together.

name: 透
text:
買おう
うちらの車
trans:
We'll buy one.
Our own car.

name: 円香
text:
ステージに立ってるのは
全然、悪い感じじゃなかった
trans: Standing up on that stage... it wasn't a bad feeling. Not at all.

name: 円香
text: 透も、歌詞を間違えなかった
trans: And Toru didn't mess up with her lyrics either.

name: 小糸
text:
誰も見てなかったけど
今度はみんな、ちゃんと歌ってたよね……？
trans: No one was watching us at all, but this time, we were all singing properly, weren't we...?

name: 小糸
text:
たぶんそうって、自分もそうだって
わかった
trans:
It felt like we did, and I felt like I did.
I knew that much.

name: 小糸
text: 誰も……見てないけど……！
trans: Though nobody... was even looking...!

name: 小糸
text:
こ、ここ……
ずっと行ったら、うみなの……！？
trans:
So──So if...
If we just keep going, we can reach the sea...!?

name: 透
text:
あるよ
このさきに、海
trans:
It's there.
Beyond here. The sea.

name: 雛菜
text:
やは～！
楽しい～～～！
trans:
Yaha～!
So much fun～!

name: 雛菜
text:
やっぱり思ってたの
すごいことが起きそうって
trans: And, you know, I was even thinking it. "Something amazing's gonna happen".

name: 雛菜
text: そしたら、誰も見てなかった
trans: And when it did, nobody was even watching!

name: 雛菜
text: みんな、もったいないことしちゃったね？
trans: And that was all their loss, wasn't it?

name: 雛菜
text: ほんとにすごくて────
trans: It really was amazing──

name: 雛菜
text: すごく、楽しかったのに！
trans: It was amazingly fun!

name: 透
text:
ありがとうございましたー
ノクチルでした
trans:
Thank you very much.
We were Noctchill.

name: 雛菜
text:
あは～
プロデューサーしか拍手してない～！
trans:
Aha～
No-one's even clapping except Producer～!

name: 小糸
text:
ちらっと見てった人はいたよ……！？
あと、座って休んでる人と────
trans:
But there were people who looked our way...!
And a few who wanted to sit down──

name: 円香
text: 別にいいよ
trans: Who cares, really.

name: 円香
text: 今の……いい感じだったから
trans: Honestly, that... felt pretty good.

name: プロデューサー
text:
──みんな、お疲れ様
よく頑張った！
trans:
──Well done, all of you!
Good work up there!

name: プロデューサー
text: 俺は、すごくよかったと思う！
trans: I think you guys really nailed it!

name: 雛菜
text:
うん～！
雛菜もそう思う～！
trans:
Yeah～!
Hinana thinks so too～!

name: 小糸
text:
わたしも、よかったと思う……！
──ね、透ちゃん！
trans:
I think it went well, too...! 
──Right, Toru-chan!

name: 透
text: じゃ、行こっか
trans: Alright. Let's go, then.

name: 小糸
trans: ──Eh?

name: 透
text:
ふふっ
海
trans:
Fufu.
The sea.

name: 透
text:
海に来たんじゃん
私たち
trans:
It was the sea, right?
We came for.

name: プロデューサー
trans: T──Toru...!

name: プロデューサー
trans: Madoka...!?

name: 雛菜
text: あは～
trans: Aha～

name: 雛菜
text: 雛菜も行く～～～！
trans: Hinana's heading in too~!

name: 小糸
text:
ぴぇ……！
ま、待って待ってわたしも……！
trans:
Pyeh...!
W──wait, wait up, me too...!

name: プロデューサー
text: お、おーい……
trans: H──hold on...

name: プロデューサー
text: おいおい……！？
trans: You're all...!?

name: 小糸＆雛菜
text: きゃーっ
trans: Hyaaah!

name: 透
text:
おーい
花火じゃなくて、こっち見ろー
trans:
Heeey.
Forget the fireworks; look over heeere.

name: 円香
text: こっち見ろー
trans: Look over heeere.

name: 小糸
text: こ、こっち見ろーー……！
trans: L──look over hereee...!

name: 雛菜
trans: Ahaaa～!

name: 雛菜
trans: Heeeeey～!

name: 透
text: 誰も見てない
trans: No one's looking.

name: 一同
text: ────あははっ
trans: ────ahahah!

name: 小糸
text: あ、あのね……！

name: 小糸
text:
ちっちゃい時、
みんなで海行こうって言ってたの覚えてる？
trans: Do you remember when we were little, and we all said we were gonna go to the sea?

name: 小糸
text:
えへへ
わたしだけかな……覚えてるの
trans:
Eheheh...
Maybe I'm the only one... who remembers.

name: 円香
text: ……覚えてる
trans: ...I remember.

name: 小糸
text: ほ、ほんと！？
trans: R──Really!?

name: 円香
text:
お金貯めて、
車で行こうって言ってたやつでしょ
trans: How we said we were going to save up our money, and go by car, right?

name: 小糸
text:
……え！
そ、そうだっけ……！
trans:
...Eh!?
I──is that what we said...!

name: 円香
text:
……っ
覚えてないの？
trans:
...──
Do you not remember?

name: 雛菜
text:
雛菜覚えてる！
貯金箱あるよ～～～！
trans:
Hinana remembers!
I've still got the piggy bank～!

name: 円香
text: あんたが？　うそ
trans: You do? Like hell.

name: 雛菜
text:
ほんとだよ～？
一万円入ってる！
trans:
It's the truth, y'know～?
There's 10000 yen in it!

name: 雛菜
text: ね、透先輩
trans: Right, Toru-senpai?

name: 透
text: ──え、うん
trans: ──Eh? Yeah.

name: 小糸
text: 透ちゃん、絶対覚えてない……！
trans: Toru-chan, you absolutely don't remember...!

name: 透
text:
あははっ
ごめん
trans:
Ahahah.
Sorry.

name: 透
text: でも
trans: But.

name: 透
text: 来れたね
trans: We made it, right?

name: 透
text:
なんか、終わらないじゃん
夏休みって
trans:
It kind of──doesn't end, right? 
Summer break.

name: 透
text:
夏休み
いつも終わらない感じして、苦手だったけど
trans:
Summer break. 
It always felt like it'd never end. Couldn't handle it.

name: 透
text:
早かったわ
海に行くの、決まったら
trans:
But then it went fast.
The moment we settled on the sea.

name: 透
text:
なんか、ちょっと進んでるっていうか
のぼってるっていうか……
trans: It feels a little like──we're progressing somewhere, or... climbing somewhere, or...

name: 透
text:
楽しいんだ、最近
こうしてるの
trans:
It's been fun. As of late.
Doing things like this.

name: 透
text: ありがと
trans: Thank you.

name: プロデューサー
text: 『そういうこと含めて、考えてほしいんだ』
trans: "Once you've taken all that in, then I want you to think about it."

name: 透
text:
それしかないや、私
理由とか
trans:
I've got nothing else but that, honestly.
Far as reasons go.

name: off
text:
暗い波間に、
ときどき花火の明かりに照らされて
trans:
They stood in pitch-dark waves,
lit up and lost again by bursts of fireworks,

name: off
text: 小さく光っているあの子たち
trans: And small, their scintillation, those four girls,

name: off
text:
夜光虫みたいに
かすかで、不安定に揺れていて────
trans:
As if sea sparkle,
faint, perturbed in their sway──

name: 一同
text: きゃはは……っ
trans: Kyahaha...──!

name: プロデューサー
text:
────なんて伝えればいいんだろうな……
こういう美しさのこと
trans:
──Just how do you convey it, is the question...
The... charm of this, the beautifulness.

name: 透
text: 花火……ばかやろー！
trans: Fireworks... go to helllll!

name: 雛菜
text: ひゅ～！　ど～～～ん！
trans: Hyuuu～! Baaaaang～!

name: 小糸
text: ば、ばかやろー……！
trans: G... go to hellll...!

name: プロデューサー
text: ──はは
trans: ──Haha.

name: プロデューサー
text:
まだ高校生なんだ……
窮屈にばっかり考えなくたっていい
trans:
They're still in high school...
They can do without every last thing being the world on their shoulders.

name: プロデューサー
text:
後悔させないように、
頑張るからな
trans:
Yeah. I'll be doing my best.
So that no-one comes away from this with any regrets.

name: プロデューサー
text: 絶対
trans: That's for sure.
